name: Mini Pumpkin Butterscotch Muffins
author: Megan
summary: These moist and deliciously-sweet pumpkin muffins are great for sharing, but you won't want to share! Don't let the pumpkin-butterscotch combination fool you, these taste great!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease mini-muffin pan with cooking spray
Sift together the flour, brown sugar, white sugar, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, baking soda, baking powder, and salt into a large bowl
Whisk together the eggs, butter, and pumpkin in a separate bowl
Mix the flour mixture with the egg mixture
Stir in the butterscotch chips; pour into each cup of the muffin pan to about 3/4 full
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, 10 to 12 minutes
